title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI-Driven Testing: Scaling Automation with KaneAI and HyperExecute (AIM230)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI驱动测试：使用KaneAI和HyperExecute扩展自动化 (AIM230)
abstract: Discover how KaneAI and HyperExecute redefine modern AI-native testing workflows for QA, developers, and DevOps teams. Go from natural language to executable automated tests with seamless integration into the AWS ecosystem. Unlock blazing-fast execution speeds—up to 70% faster than legacy automation grids—while LambdaTest delivers a unified, AI-first testing platform. Accelerate release velocity by 64%, achieve over 90% stability, and cut audit preparation time by 70%. Embrace conversational test authoring, resilient execution, and audit-ready traceability—all deeply embedded within your CI/CD pipelines for a truly AI-native workflow.  This presentation is brought to you by LambdaTest, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 探索KaneAI和HyperExecute如何重新定义面向QA、开发人员和DevOps团队的现代AI原生测试工作流程。从自然语言到可执行的自动化测试，与AWS生态系统无缝集成。释放极速执行能力——比传统自动化网格快高达70%——同时LambdaTest提供统一的AI优先测试平台。将发布速度提升64%，实现超过90%的稳定性，并将审计准备时间缩短70%。拥抱对话式测试编写、弹性执行和审计就绪的可追溯性——所有这些都深度嵌入到您的CI/CD管道中，实现真正的AI原生工作流程。本演示由AWS合作伙伴LambdaTest为您呈现。
